archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: LA-Galbi Short Ribs with Habanero Chimichurri Corn Rice and Quick Cabbage-Cucumber Pickles
description: Korean-style grilled beef short ribs get a gochujang-soy glaze, paired with Latin-inspired habanero chimichurri corn rice and bright quick pickles. Built hot and fast on the grill with bold, spicy sides.
prep_steps: Slice cabbage and cucumber thinly; set in a medium bowl.
Mince garlic and habanero chillies; slice spring onion; chop coriander.
Rinse jasmine rice under cold water until it runs clear; drain well.
In a large bowl, whisk gochujang, soy sauce, honey, 2 tbsp rice vinegar, 1 minced garlic clove, 1 tbsp sesame oil, and black pepper. Reserve 2 tbsp of this glaze in a small bowl for basting.
Add beef short ribs to the large bowl with the remaining glaze; toss to coat. Marinate 20–30 minutes at room temp.
In a small bowl, combine remaining rice vinegar (about 2 tbsp), sugar, and a big pinch of salt. Pour over cabbage and cucumber; toss and press down to lightly pickle.
Stir chimichurri with minced habanero chillies and lime juice; set aside.
Preheat OutdoorGrill to high heat (clean, oil grates). Place a lidded saucepan on the StoveTop for rice and a skillet for corn.
cook_steps: Cook rice: Add jasmine rice, water, and a pinch of salt to the saucepan. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce to low, and simmer 12 minutes. Turn off heat and rest 10 minutes covered.
Char the corn: Heat 1 tsp sesame oil in the skillet over medium-high. Add corn and a pinch of salt; cook 3–4 minutes, stirring, until lightly charred. Remove from heat.

Grill ribs: Lightly oil grill grates with canola oil. Shake excess marinade from ribs. Grill 3–4 minutes per side, basting once with the reserved glaze. Aim for deep caramelization with slight char; move to a cooler zone if flare-ups occur. Rest 5 minutes.
Finish rice: Fluff rice; fold in charred corn and 2–3 tbsp of the habanero chimichurri. Taste and season with salt if needed.
Serve: Mound chimichurri corn rice on plates. Top with grilled short ribs. Add a pile of cabbage-cucumber pickles (drain off excess liquid). Spoon extra habanero chimichurri over ribs to taste.
Garnish: Sprinkle spring onion, coriander, and sesame seeds over the ribs and rice.
